channel.title: Failure of Christianity on Disciple School
channel.description: Recent content in Failure of Christianity on Disciple School

item.title: The Christianity of Chris Pratt
item.description: This article is not really about Chris Pratt. It’s about Christianity - the modern form of Christianity that is nothing like the Christianity we read about in the Bible. I could just have easily substituted Pratt’s name with Lady Gaga, or virtually any other famous person who claims to love Jesus. Actually, I don’t think I need to use the name of any famous people at all. I could have entitled it, “The Christianity of Most Americans,” but I think it helps to throw the name of a famous person in there.
